column2: Frac tank delivery and equipment rental
There will be no change in the presently approved contract completion date due to this change
in the work; all costs to maintain this date are included in this CCO.
There will be a change to the present contract completion date of TBD days,
due to the changes in the work.
There may be a revision to the presently approved contract completion date; due to the changes
in the work. MPL reserves the right to assess the actual effects to the original completion date
at a later date due to the impact of this additional work.
